mapper.select: SELECT kc.id,sp.shp_mch shp_mch,sp.shp_tp sh_tp,kc.jg,kc.kcdz,GROUP_CONCAT(sxm.shxm_mch,sxz.shxzh,sxz.shxzh_mch) shp_sx FROM t_mall_product sp, t_mall_sku kc, t_mall_sku_attr_value sxg, t_mall_attr sxm, t_mall_value sxz WHERE sp.Id=kc.shp_id AND kc.Id=sxg.sku_id AND sxg.shxm_id=sxm.Id AND sxg.shxzh_id=sxz.Id AND sp.flbh2=#{id} group by shp_mch
select flmch1 from t_mall_class_1 where id =#{id}
select flmch2 from t_mall_class_2 where id= #{id}
select mark.* from t_mall_trade_mark mark,t_mall_tm_class class where class.flbh1=#{id} and mark.id=class.pp_id
select id,shxm_mch from t_mall_attr where flbh2=#{id}
select id,shxzh,shxzh_mch from t_mall_value where shxm_id=#{id}

SELECT sp.Id,shp_mch,sp.shp_tp sh_tp,kc.jg,kc.kcdz,GROUP_CONCAT(sxm.shxm_mch,sxz.shxzh,sxz.shxzh_mch) shp_sx FROM t_mall_product sp, t_mall_sku kc, t_mall_sku_attr_value sxg, t_mall_attr sxm, t_mall_value sxz WHERE sp.Id=kc.shp_id AND kc.Id=sxg.sku_id AND sxg.shxm_id=sxm.Id AND sxg.shxzh_id=sxz.Id AND kc.Id=#{id} group by shp_mch
SELECT ms.Id, ms.tjshl, sk.sku_mch mch, sk.jg jg, ms.chjshj sj, mp.shp_tp shptp FROM t_mall_shoppingcar ms, t_mall_product mp, t_mall_sku sk WHERE ms.shp_id = mp.id AND ms.sku_id = sk.id
mapper.delete: delete from t_mall_shoppingcar where id in (${_parameter})
mapper.select: SELECT ms.Id, ms.tjshl, sk.sku_mch mch, sk.jg jg, ms.chjshj sj, mp.shp_tp shptp FROM t_mall_shoppingcar ms, t_mall_product mp, t_mall_sku sk WHERE ms.shp_id = mp.id AND ms.sku_id = sk.id and ms.yh_id = #{yh_id}
SELECT count(ms.id) FROM t_mall_shoppingcar ms, t_mall_product mp, t_mall_sku sk WHERE ms.shp_id = mp.id AND ms.sku_id = sk.id and ms.yh_id = #{yh_id}
